replies.body:
Look where they are. High mountain peaks above the clouds, looking to the celestial skies?

This is gonna be Mt. Targon related. Possibly the only remaining people who have properly recorded history of the lunari prior to their being wiped out? Constellation has reappeared due to Diana's attempt to resurrect lunair ways?

EDIT: Haha, look at all these upvotes I'm getting. Man, I wish I wasn't because rereading it a second time, I realize I misread the wording on the final page and I no longer think its Mt. Targon afterall. I'm gonna go with what a few other people have said and lean towards Ionia.

Could also be Ionia. Consider the trees on the outside of the screen and the peoples' clothing. The terrain is consistent with some of the Ionian champs splash arts (Syndra, Karma) and the clothing more fits that style.
I agree with this. The clothing is **very** Ionian, as it the terrain.

Although, did anybody else notice the words "clouds of destruction"
CLOUDS
What has to do with clouds? Tornadoes.
Who has to do with mountains, clouds, gods and shurima?
HMMMMMMMM








































Ao Shin perhaps?
I thought Ao Shin was supposed to be a dragon made of lightning or something. The last symbol has 3 stars that make a triangle. Illuminati confirmed, half life 3 confirmed.
please be Ao Shin

Both points are valid, it's definitely one of those, but i'd like too see something from mount targon; there are lots of ionian champs and only 3 from targon (Disclaimer: I might be wrong all ik is panth, leona, and diana)
I thought Panth Leona and Diana were in their own country?
which is Mount Targon.
Logged in just to up vote this cause I thought it was that good.
On the other hand has Mt. Targon shown any signs of having any musical/bardic-related culture?
Mt. Targon as a whole is an area Ironstylus recently said needs to be more fleshed out and better defined. This could be the way they're doing that.
I like this better then all of the other champion teasers. It's so calm.
You mean you don't find the sounds of horrible creatures screeching and limbs being ripped apart soothing? Strange... {{champion:421}}
So strange, they scream.{{champion:61}}
...if you see the last constellation, it is shaped like a triangle... that could only mean... ILLUMINATI CNFIRMED! RIOT IS ILLUMINATI! THIS CHAMPION IS ILLUMINATI! ILLUMINATI!ILLUMINATI!
calm your nips keyori
upvote for keyboy reference
Half Life 3?
Am I the only one who thought {{champion:80}} and {{champion:37}} had a little too much fun on vacation in Shurima?
why would it be pantheon obviously {{champion:16}} and {{champion:37}}
because without modern technology, it takes a male and female to produce new life?
well soraka does have her horn
I mean, even with modern technology, it still takes a male and a female. They just don't necessarily ever have to meet.
Well, if we are getting technical blood marrow transplant can create life between female and female
kinky
Bard... I swear its gonna be a support
Bards are known for travelling. By this logic it would be another jungler
Bards are more known for songs.. and giving their party buffs/spirit.. so i would say support bard.. not jungle, but who knows.
Though we already have {{champion:37}}  I wonder what their differences would be?
Well, bards can prolly talk better than {{champion:37}}...
Support Jungle!!
bards are also knowing for being spies and assassins which means it could be a dps jungler
Bard was announced a year or two ago as a support
Source?

That final symbol is on a rock in summoner's rift. If you know the place where the deer pops out between blue side blue buff and gromp, it's on the top of the stone there. I saw it glowing once but I have no idea why it was.
they are adding a few of these to the rift. They are a teaser for the new champ.
I saw it a week ago playing with my friend, and my first thought was "New Champ". He says no way it's too early, and I told him he was full of it.
Please be a new jungler! Jungle is so limited at the moment {{item:3070}}
literally last champion was a jungler
And before that, the last jungler release was Zac, back in March of 2013.
Gnar is capable of jungling and Aatrox is *extremely* capable of jungling.
YES plz rito the only good ones r{{champion:59}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:64}} plz new jg
Um excuse me wheres my {{champion:19}} ?
{{champion:9}} , {{champion:113}}  is still good too.
What about {{champion:20}}
Name is Virgil http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2353889&highlight=virgil check it

Gonna try to stay humble and not jump to any conclusions; Virgil has been buried for a long time. I'm just glad to see this happening. I'm sure it's gonna be great. :)

Gotta say the nostalgia is hitting me pretty hard right meow.

Wow! I just read your three year old thread and I must say, that is impressive. The fact that the hints here line up so well with the story you laid out, I would hope that Riot is going to give you at least some consideration.

That is, if all of our wild assumptions are correct.

But I mean, come on! IT'S GOTTA BE HIM!
{{champion:266}} Bard Aatrax confirmed
